name: Se@men
description:
Save the stranded pirates! Your fleet had been ambushed! Try to save the crew while you can! By the way, your ship is modded with rocket propelled gyroscopic launcher. Try not to lose control.

WASD to move

Spacebar to launch yourself

Q / E to balance yourself

Collect stranded pirates in time to unlock harder challenge mode!

All 3D models are downloaded from Kenney Assets
Music : Netherworld Shanty - Kevin Macleod

PS. This is my 1st try on Unity 3D please let me know if there is anything I can do better in this project. Thank you!
